examples: A piece of oatmeal stuck in the underhang of Roy's lip. May sipped her morning coffee, watching it bob as he spoke.

verbs.description: underhang (third-person singular simple present underhangs, present participle underhanging, simple past and past participle underhung)

examples: Though less commonly done, it is best to underhang framing pieces — such as letting the girder extend well beyond the end joists if the girder is especially attractive.
